team.name: Tim White
team.bio: Self-taught developer obsessed with precision body composition tracking. Based in Los Angeles, the music capital of the world, close to all the major labels, agencies, studios, and management companies. Previously worked at Big MGMT in NYC building internal tools to promote music artists and secure licensing deals, and at Bravo Media as a consultant on projects for Google, Hulu, T-Mobile, Netflix, and the NFL. Proficient in Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Clerk, Stripe, Vue, Nuxt, Laravel, and Python. Uses AI agents including Claude Code, Copilot, Cursor, Sweep, and Codex for accelerated development.
team.quote: What gets measured gets managed. Body composition tracking changed my life.
